day.meaning: To abscond is to leave, flee, or escape a place in secret and go into hiding. Often, someone is said to have absconded with something

questions.title: The zombie apocalypse is coming. Who are the three people you want on your team in order to survive? The team can be from the audience as well/ any one in the planet.
hints: have to take care of food, water and shelter,electricity?
what to do for mental peace

questions.title: You have been accused of peeing on a government property. They do not have a solid proof. They are interrogating you. Prove to them that you didn't do it.
hints: make up an alibi (eg. get your friend to back you up)
try to argue its not urine on the wall but water
avert the blame on the police officer?

questions.title: You have time travelled to 300 years ago in a time machine chair without wearing any clothes. There are several people looking at you. Prove to them/us you're from the future.
hints: argue that you appeared out of nowhere
travel in time 5 minutes later to prove it to them

questions.title: You are in an outing. One of your friend is too drunk /high. How do you calm him down?
hints: ask him if he needs water or anything to eat
drink/ get high with him to go through it together
take him outdoors, describe how your steps could help

questions.title: You just opened up a tea shop in the streets of Boudha. How do you plan to grow your business?
hints: have some offers, make tea better
ask friends to sit there everyday. go crazy on your imagination!
